items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Christmas Sweater
items.body: I wouldn't consider this ugly! It's actually somewhat cute, but I can see how it would fit an ugly sweater party. It's pretty heavy actually, well made and thick. But since it's knit, it is also breathable. Best of both worlds. The colors are really bright and festive. Since it buttons so you can always layer it with a lighter shirt underneath. I'm a size 8-10 in dress, fluctuating between a medium and large in shirts. This was a large and it fit great, as seen in the photo. Read more
items.author: AJC23

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Runs smaller than expected. Very warm and made with great quality. Read more
items.author: Shelly O'Neal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Christmas cardigan
items.body: This is a much heavier-weight sweater than I expected, since most "ugly christmas sweaters" are made of cheaper, thinner material. This seems to be well made and durable. Also great that it can be washed in the washing machine, since my other 'ugly' sweaters all have some kind of decoration that means they can't be washed. Note that there is an extra button attached to the tag inside the sweater, don't forget to take it off before you wash it (like I did). Also note that this runs small, order a size up unless you want the buttons stretching open at the front! Read more
items.author: LC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size Runs Small
items.body: Cute but size runs very small - Ordered XL to get loose fit, but it fit like M-L size... too snug to button up Read more
items.author: DeeA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and very well-made!
items.body: I am beyond pleased with this JATEBI Christmas sweater. The quality of the knit is top-notch and the print is adorable. I vacillate between a size medium and large, and decided to size down and order the medium. I'm so glad that I did! The length of the sleeves is perfect, and the button-up opening at the front shows just the right amount of shirt underneath. This looks festive and upscale with my dressy black pants and easily coordinates with any of my solid black, red, green, or white t-shirts. I would call this knit a medium weight, making it great for layering, and a warm sweater, but probably not as an outer coat in the cold weather. This will be my go-to sweater all holiday season. Read more
items.author: CJJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Here's your ugly Christmas sweater!
items.body: From the ad pictures I didn't think that the "Black" option (with the Santa faces) was that ugly. But when I put it on, yep, it qualifies as an ugly Christmas sweater. The icons on the sweater are big and a little cartoonish in person. Also, the face of the Santa is a neon yellow. That right there makes it cheesy. The fit, I got a medium, is very generous. I'd size it as a large. The sleeves are plenty long and so is the bottom hem. There is an odor to it but after washing in cold and drying full heat there was no shrinkage. I think one more washing will remove the last of the chemical odor. The sweater is smooth to the touch on the inside and outside (it's acrylic) however against bare arms I found it slightly itchy (but not wool itchy). For December it will be quite cold, so I'll have a long sleeve shirt on anyway. The material is substantial, and it didn't pill from washing. The red trim pops in terms of color. The buttons work and the cardigan doesn't gap between the buttons. The sweater definitely has weight and hangs nicely when worn. Read more
items.author: Insightful Reviewer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well and is not itchy like most ugly sweaters tend to be
items.body: My wife says it's comfortable and is not itchy like most ugly sweaters are. The quality is pretty good, should hold up for a few years, just make sure not to use any super abrasive cleaners on it in the wash. Read more
items.author: Los

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Runs Small
items.body: I love everything about this JATEBI Christmas Ugly Cardigan Sweater except its size. IT RUNS SMALL! I ordered an XL and I should have ordered an XXL. I will wear it unbuttoned, so it doesn’t pooch where my tummy pooches. The sleeve length is nice, the weave is nice, the designs are nice, the colors are nice. I really like it! Oh, and BTW, it is NOT an ugly/funny sweater. It’s a beautiful sweater, one which I will enjoy wearing to our Christmas Parties during the holidays. Unbuttoned, of course. Read more
items.author: GAAAASP!

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
